text: Uniontown is a city in Perry County, Alabama in the United States of America. As of the 2020 census, the population of the city is 2,107. ==Notable Residents and Natives== *Tony Cox, actor, born in Uniontown on March 31, 1958. *Eugene Lipscomb, football player, born in Uniontown on August 9, 1931 *Erwin Dudley, professional basketball player ==References== Category:Cities in Alabama
title: Uniontown, Alabama
